episodes.title: Enigma Of Cults / Gavriel Hacohen | Episode #44 | Everyday BS
episodes.description: Philly Sits down with Cult Researcher and Co-Host of Leaving Eden Podcast , Gavriel Hacohen (Gavi) . They chat about living in Philadelphia and dive into the religious cults happening in the country.
